import sketching sketch = sketching.Sketch2DWeb(500, 500, 'example-canvas') sketch.clear('#505050') sketch.clear_stroke() sketch.set_ellipse_mode('radius') sketch.set_angle_mode('degrees') sketch.set_fill('#A6CEE350') sketch.draw_ellipse(0, 0, 100, 100) sketch.set_fill('#1F78B450') sketch.translate(250, 250) sketch.draw_ellipse(0, 0, 100, 100) sketch.show()
